titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 692) to ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 692) to ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-300, by Ms. Foxx.
Resolution provides for consideration of both H.R. 10 and H.R. 692.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 66.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 480.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 480, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 181 (Roll no. 553).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 182 (Roll no. 554).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 10) to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 692) to ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.
